message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to purchase it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $122?
I'm not willing to go much lower, Bob. I'm thinking more along the lines of $127 now. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
